abstract: At an “Arrested Development” reunion event, the show’s creator, Mitchell Hurwitz, said he was planning 9 or 10 episodes that would reintroduce that show’s characters and lead to a possible film.
snippet: At an “Arrested Development” reunion event, the show’s creator, Mitchell Hurwitz, said he was planning 9 or 10 episodes that would reintroduce that show’s characters and lead to a possible film.

headline.main: 'Arrested Development' Movie, and New TV Episodes, Are in the Works
headline.print_headline: The Bluths May Get Back to Their Funny Business
